summary: "The Day the Earth Stood Still" is a 2008 American sci-fi movie, remade from the 1951 film. It stars Keanu Reeves as Klaatu, an alien sent to Earth to save it from humans' environmental damage. The story updates the Cold War theme with today's environmental concerns. Co-starring Jennifer Connelly and Jaden Smith, the film was a financial hit, making over $233 million globally, though critics didn't like it much. It was released in December 2008, after being scheduled for May.
title: The Day the Earth Stood Still (2008 film)
